overview: Chris is founder and chief developer for Up! Interactive Media. Chris brings over 15 years of experience managing and deploying both enterprise-level and mobile solutions in a variety of environments with expert knowledge of iPhone and Android development. His track record includes bridging the gap between technical solutions and client business needs, recognized for excelling at customer interaction, presentations, and building strong development teams. Previously Tech Director and Solutions Architect for R/GA, Chris developed and executed mobile application platforms for Nike, Walmart, and Tiffany & Co. At SunGard, he worked on first-generation solutions for the financial sector, including custom architecture for analysis, reporting, and increased security for Fortune 500 clients. Chris also created the critically-acclaimed desktop/online career organization software for actors, protalentPerformer, and companion mobile app iPerform.
